names.pinyin: wen shen shen shi hua yu tang
names.english: warm the kidneys, tonify yang and transform stasis decoction
names.commonEnglish: Warm the Kidneys, Tonify Yang and Transform Stasis Decoction

actions: Activates the Blood, dispels Stasis, promotes urination and reduces swelling and edema.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and drains Kidney Fire.

With Fu Ling, facilitates the removal of water and leaches out Dampness to treat stagnant water and Dampness leading to edema, jaundice, diarrhea, Milky Lin, and scanty, difficult urination with abdominal distention.
With Fu Ling and Zhu Ling, for generalized edema.
Tonifies Qi and Blood, strengthens the Spleen, raises Yang Qi, tonifies the Lungs, aids the circulation of moisture downward from the face, promotes urination and reduces edema.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, disperses Wind-Cold-Damp and strengthens the sinews and bones.
Tonifies the Kidneys and Liver, strengthens the sinews and bones, aids the smooth flow of Qi and Blood and tonifies Kidney Yang.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
With Zhu Ling, promotes urination for Lin Syndrome, scanty urine, edema, loose stools, vaginal discharge, jaundice, leg Qi and diarrhea.
Promotes urination and leaches out Dampness.
With Fu Ling, for Lin syndrome, scanty urine, edema, loose stools, vaginal discharge, jaundice, leg Qi and diarrhea.
With Fu Ling and Ze Xie, for edema due to Spleen Deficiency.
Activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and relieves pain.
Breaks up Blood Stasis and activates Blood circulation.
Activates the Blood and promotes the movement of Qi.
Warms Ming Men Fire and assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang.
With Huang Qi, for spontaneous sweat and chills due to Yang Deficiency.
With Fu Ling, for lower body edema and dysuria.
Warms the Kidneys, Spleen and Heart, strengthens Yang and Ming Men Fire and disperses deep Cold.
With Zhi Fu Zi, powerfully tonifies Kidney Yang, for Kidney Yang Deficiency with lower back pain and weakness in the legs and knees.
Warms the Kidneys
Supplements Yang
Tonifies Qi
Activates the Blood

symptoms: Facial and bodily superficial edema, especially below the waist
Counterflow Cold of the four limbs
Low back soreness, heaviness, weakness and pain
